SECRET4BRONZE.business_description: Configuration table for Bronze layer secrets and application settings

columns.name: APP_NAME
columns.business_description: Name of the application or service

columns.name: CONFIG_KEY
columns.business_description: Configuration parameter key identifier

columns.name: CONFIG_VALUE
columns.business_description: Configuration parameter value

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.business_description: Description of the configuration parameter

columns.name: IS_SENSITIVE
columns.business_description: Flag indicating if the configuration contains sensitive data

columns.name: CREATED_AT
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was created

columns.name: UPDATED_AT
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

summary.data_governance_notes: All tables follow consistent schema pattern for configuration management across different data layers (Bronze, Silver, Gold) with proper timestamp tracking and sensitivity flags for data governance.
